articles.title: Shocking space! SpaceX Starlink satellites face huge threat up in the sky - HT Tech
articles.description: Shocking data has revealed that the SpaceX Starlink satellites were forced to dodge objects as many as 25000 times in six months, highlighting the big problem of crowded lower orbits of Earth.
articles.content: The low Earth orbit is becoming a dangerous playing field. At present, there are 4,411 SpaceX Starlink satellites that roam there and CEO Elon Musk plans to launch many more of them in the near futur… [+3135 chars]

articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)July 11, 2023

articles.title: Singapore state investor Temasek posts negative annual return, its first since 2020 - CNBC

articles.title: A new technique uses remote images to gauge the strength of ancient and active rivers beyond Earth - Phys.org
articles.description: Rivers have flowed on two other worlds in the solar system besides Earth: Mars, where dry tracks and craters are all that's left of ancient rivers and lakes, and Titan, Saturn's largest moon, where rivers of liquid methane still flow today.
